title: Apple Stock Is Rising After Reports Suggest the New iPhone Isn’t a Dud After All
text:
Apple’s bet on a more affordable iPhone model might be paying off after Nikkei reported that the company is increasing production by as much as 10%. That news has helped push Apple stock higher in premarket trading.

Ever since Apple announced its latest generation of iPhones, Wall Street has been trying to gauge whether or not consumers think they are worthy of an upgrade. Some believe the prospect of a 5G iPhone will make for an off year for iPhone sales, while others point to better camera quality and a budget model that’s...
description: Apple’s bet on a more affordable iPhone model might be paying off after Nikkei reported that the company is increasing production by as much as 10%. That news has helped push Apple stock higher in premarket trading.
